Text:
Classification: Reality
Genre: Lifestyle | Music
Status: Returning Series
Network: VH1 ( USA)
Airs: Mondays at 08:00 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: March 06, 2011
Episode Order: 10

"Love & Hip Hop" follows four dynamic women who are connected to the world of hip hop, whether it's through the men they love, or their struggle to be heard as an artist. "Love & Hip Hop" provides a dramatic, funny and sometimes heartbreaking look into the female side of the New York hip hop life as these four women try to claim their own place in it. 
(http://www.tvrage.com/Love_And_Hip_Hop)
